bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology--X Window System--Modular Toolkit Environment (MTE)
IEEE Standard for Information Technology--X Window System--Modular Toolkit Environment (MTE)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Graphical user interface (GUI) applications and user interfaces to open systems are covered. This standard defines the application interface to a group of widgets built upon the X Window System X Toolkit Intrinsics.

Graphical user interface (GUI) applications and user interfaces to open systems are covered. This standard defines the application interface to a group of widgets built upon the X Window System X Toolkit Intrinsics.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
